content: अपवारित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} Covered, concealed; °तं प्रवहणं तिष्ठति <ls>Mk. 6</ls> covered; vanished, disappeared. --तं, अपवारितकं Concealed or secret manner. --तं , अपवारितकेन, अपवार्य {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Frequently occurring in dramas in the sense of ‘apart’ ‘aside to another’ (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रकाशं); it is speaking in such a way that only the person addressed may hear it; तद्भवेदपवारितं रहस्यं तु यदन्यस्य परावृत्त्य प्रकाश्यते . त्रिपताककरेणान्यमपवार्यांतरा कथां <ls>S. D. 6.</ls>
